scripts.dev: npm run port:cleanup && npm run env:setup && npm run env:validate && concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run env:setup && npm run env:validate && npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=backend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=backend && npm run format --workspace=frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --workspace=backend && npm run format:check --workspace=frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=backend && npm run type-check --workspace=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.port:check: node scripts/port-cleanup.js --check || echo 'No processes found on development ports'
